Title: Requires that candidates for certain offices be residents and registered voters in the district containing the public office or party position sought at certain times during the electoral process
Summary: Requires that candidates for certain offices be residents and registered voters in the district containing the public office or party position sought at certain times during the electoral process.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to requiring that candidates for certain offices be residents and registered voters in the district containing the public office or party position sought at certain times during the electoral process
